title: With Bitcoin at $51,000, Wall Street Skeptics Must Pay Attention
itunes:title: With Bitcoin at $51,000, Wall Street Skeptics Must Pay Attention
description:
Dr. Shelley Hearne, Director of the Johns Hopkins Center for Public Health Advocacy at the Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses how the Biden administration is managing the pandemic. Bloomberg News Energy and Environmental Policy Reporter Jennifer Dlouhy shares details of Texas’ gas-export clampdown as the blackouts drag on. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg Markets Senior Editor Mike Regan talk about why many professionals involved in the traditional financial system can no longer ignore Bitcoin. Bloomberg Intelligence Head of Market Structure Research Larry Tabb breaks down today’s congressional hearing on the retail stock trading frenzy. And we Drive to the Close with Dan Pipitone, Co-Founder of TradeZero America.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
